text: Sure was, Dad.

title: TIMMY
text: It's so wonderful to be on the same wavelength as our kids.

title: TIMMY
text: Here you go, Stan and Kyle. Free drinks on me.

title: TIMMY
text: Oh, thank you, Chef. How nice.

title: TIMMY
text: I know. I'd like to sing the complex and amazing song that won me the Oscar, a song entitlted, "You'll Be In... Me." Thanks.

title: TIMMY
role: Deep inside of me. [Chef hands drinks to more kids]

title: TIMMY
role: So deep inside, I can feel you pushing against my heart.

title: TIMMY
text: Come on, drink it down. It's free.

title: TIMMY
text: You'll be inside of me...

title: TIMMY
text: Huh? Oh no! Agh!  Get off me! Get off me! Somebody help!! Please?? Somebody get it off of me!! Get it off of me.

title: TIMMY
text: I feel... different.

title: TIMMY
text: Yeah.

title: TIMMY
text: Get off of me, Christina Aguilera! Alright?! Please! Hegh, hegh

title: TIMMY
text: Drink this, Eric.  God help me! Heh, get it...  She's gone! Thank God!

title: TIMMY
text: Well, thanks!

title: TIMMY
text: Wait a minute! Phil Collins sucks ass!

title: TIMMY
text: Yeah! What the hell were we thinking?! Boooooo!

title: TIMMY
text: I think it's working.

title: TIMMY
text: Booooo!!

title: TIMMY
text: Shut your filthy holes, you little bastards!

title: TIMMY
text: Get off the stage, Phil Collins! We want Timmy!

title: TIMMY
text: Yeah!

title: TIMMY
text: You just wanna laugh at him.

title: TIMMY
text: No!  You see, we learned something today. Yeah, sure, we laughed at Timmy, but what's wrong with laughter? Just because we laugh at something doesn't mean we don't care about it. Timmy made us smile, and playing made Timmy smile, so where was the harm in that? The people that are wrong are the ones that think people like Timmy should be "protected" and kept out of the public's eye. The cool thing about Timmy being in a band was that he was in your face, and you had to deal with him, whether you laughed or cried, or felt nothing. That's why Timmy rules!

title: TIMMY
text: Yeah! Tim-my! Tim-my!

title: TIMMY
text: Tim-my! Tim-my! Tim-my! Tim-my!

title: TIMMY
text: A desert near town. Mark and Timmy stand outside, Jonesy sits on the running board

title: TIMMY
text: Man, it sucks not being part of Lalapalabala.

title: TIMMY
text: Yeah.

title: TIMMY
text: Hey dudes.

title: TIMMY
text: Skyler, what are you doing here?!  Isn't Reach for the Skyler supposed to play soon?

title: TIMMY
text: They booed Phil Collins off the stage. Everyone's chanting for Timmy and the Lords of the Underworld.

title: TIMMY
text: Oh, so now that they want us, you think you can waltz, um, back into our lives and be in the band again?

title: TIMMY
text: I don't expect anything. Timmy, I-gh... Well, I just wanted to say we had some pretty rockin' times, dude, and... maybe I let fame and Phil Collins go to my head...

title: TIMMY
text: Timmih!

title: TIMMY
text: Wow. They really are chanting for us.

title: TIMMY
text: Hn they want us back.

title: TIMMY
text: What do you say, Timmy?

title: TIMMY
text: Rrr, rrr, uh, Timmih.

title: TIMMY
text: Alright!

title: TIMMY
text: The Lalapalalapaza concert.

title: TIMMY
text: Ladies and gentlemen, without further ado, it is my pleasure to introduce the reunion tour of Timmehuh!

title: TIMMY
text: Timmiihh, and the Lords of the Underworld! Timmiihh!  Timmih! Livin' a lie-ah! Hidilah Timmy!  Timmuh- Timmiihh! Timmehuh Timmih Timmiihh!

title: TIMMY
text: And the Lords of the Underworld.

title: TIMMY
text: Put me down, you filthy bastards! Awwww!

title: TIMMY
text: Timmiihh uluh-livin' a lie!
